text: Has anyone come across any good Black Friday deals yet?

elements.text: Has anyone come across any good Black Friday deals yet?

text: What is the going rate for a remote senior UX writer in the US? I am making the case to my department manager that we need someone with health tech UX writing experience to improve a very critical soon-to-be-launched COVID-19 status verification portal. It's already a very confusing, multi-step, category-first product so someone who understand health tech and can simplify it for a non-tech audience is important. Right now, our Product and Marketing teams are duking it out and the content is quite frankly bad. If we launch with it as-is, we'll get bad app store reviews (among consumers) and enterprise clients (large employers) might not want to renew either.
